name: code-inspiration
description: Capture snippets of code inspiration while on the go.

scripts.prod-build: react-scripts build; surge build https://code-inspiration.surge.sh; open https://code-inspiration.surge.sh
scripts.build: mkdir public/src || true; cp -r src/* public/src

hooks.pre-commit: npm run start & (npm run reminder; if (npm run cypress-test); then (npm run reminder); else (npm run reminder && exit 1); fi;);
